### New Brunswick High School agent-based modeling project  
During the 2018 and 2019 school years, Dr. McManus worked with the <a href="http://hs.nbpschools.net/"> New Brunswick High School </a> Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics Club </a> on an agent-based modeling project based the coral-algal competition. We use the NetLogo programming language through <a href="https://netlogoweb.org"> NetLogo Web</a>. Below are some of the materials used during this informal course and project. <br>
